name: A Wild Yeast Appears!
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 46 by mortus in 72 hours. The there was "Keep it Alive".

Hint: add yeast to some sugar content inside of a bottle and then wait for a few days (clicking on a calendar on the right side of the area skips one day).

Use mouse wheel to rotate items in hand.

Buy ingredients and try to brew some exceptional bewerages. The game vastly lacks major features, so just try to experiment and get the most expensive drink possible!

Music:
"Bittersweet" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
